content: a cute mini stocking that will complement the previously released mini hat 1 mitt 2 and sweater 3 patterns mix and match your colors and create a beautiful garland happy holidays experience level advanced beginner materials * woolstok worsted bundle 100% fine highland wool 21 mini hanks 5g/12 yards 1 bundle holiday cheer finished measurments * circumference 3 * height 3½ cuff to toe colors shown * cast iron no 1300 * gravel road no 1302 * highland fleece no 1303 * wild thyme no 1306 * earth ivy no 1309 * cranberry compote no 1310 * red rock no 1315 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/holiday-cheer-mini-hat 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/holiday-cheer-mini-mitt 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/holiday-cheer-mini-sweater
